meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word "pictures."
meanings.sent1: I love looking at old family pix.
meanings.sent2: She keeps all her vacation pix in an album.
meanings.sent3: The pix on the wall seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: The pix in the magazine made the story come alive.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pix of the sunset were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A unit of computer memory equal to 4 bits.
meanings.sent1: The computer can store many pix of data.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the image is saved in the right pix format.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pix in the computer caused a glitch.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a pix, small but important.
meanings.sent5: The pix of information were easy to access.

meanings.definition: A small, mischievous fairy or sprite.
meanings.sent1: The pix played tricks on the forest animals.
meanings.sent2: Children love to read stories about magical pix.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pix turned the garden into a playground.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the tinkling of pix wings.
meanings.sent5: The pix danced in the moonlight, their glow enchanting.
